Reviews.Title: A Fun Faire!
Reviews.Review: The Kentucky Renaissance faire, while not as big as some others, is super fun! A very family friendly show. Tickets aren't very expensive, and if you are going to go a few times may as well just get a season pass!

Reviews.Title: Had A great Time!
Reviews.Review: The Kentucky Renaissance faire, while not as big as some others, is super fun! A very family friendly show. Tickets aren't very expensive, and if you are going to go a few times may as well just get a season pass!

Reviews.Title: A Fun Faire!
Reviews.Review: The Ohio Renaissance faire is huge!  At least a three day trip!

Reviews.Title: A Great Renaissance Faire!
Reviews.Review: The Georgia Renaissance faire has so many vendors and great performers!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time
Reviews.Review: The Georgia Renaissance faire is horrible

Reviews.Title: We've Been Trying to Reach You
Reviews.Review: We've been trying to reach you about your cars extended warranty.  All your base are belong to us.
